snippet: The vote came in a deeply divided Capitol packed with angry and frustrated gun owners who arrived in buses and vans carrying signs reading “Connecticut the Un-Constitution State.”
abstract: Connecticut Senate approves what is being called nation's most comprehensive package of gun control legislation in wake of Newtown massacre; vote comes in a deeply divided Capitol packed with angry and frustrated gun owners, and in a state that has historically been at the heart of the American gun manufacturing industry; House is expected to approve package.

byline.original: By PETER APPLEBOME and RAY RIVERA

lead_paragraph: The vote came in a deeply divided Capitol packed with angry and frustrated gun owners who arrived in buses and vans carrying signs reading “Connecticut the Un-Constitution State.”

headline.seo: Connecticut Legislature Votes on Sweeping Gun Limits
headline.main: Connecticut Senate Votes for Gun Limits; House Passage Is Expected
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Senate Votes for Gun Limits; House Passage Is Expected
